p: Viral RNA has been confirmed in the serum, and different tissues (including lung, spleen, liver and muscle) of pigs euthanised during PEDV infection (Suzuki et al. 2016; Jung et al. 2014, 2015a; Lohse et al. 2017; Chen et al. 2016a; Park and Shin 2014) with high RNA titres in the serum of 7–8 log 10 GE/mL coinciding with peak RNA titres in faeces (11–12 log 10 GE/mL) (Jung et al. 2015a). Additionally, PEDV RNA is identified in 40.8% (20/49) of sow milk samples during the epidemics caused by emerging PEDV strains (Sun et al. 2012).
